transcript.text: Good morning everyone. Let's start our daily standup. Bob, would you like to go first?
Sure, thanks Alice. Yesterday I finished the user authentication module and wrote unit tests for it. Today I'm planning to start working on the password reset functionality.
No blockers at the moment, but I might need some clarification on the email template requirements later.
Perfect. Just ping me when you need that clarification. Carol, how about you?
I worked on the dashboard redesign yesterday and implemented the new navigation component. The responsive design is working well on mobile devices now.
Today I'll be adding the search functionality to the dashboard and updating the CSS to match the new design system.
I'm blocked on getting the search API endpoints from the backend team though.
I'll follow up with the backend team after this meeting. They should have those endpoints ready by end of day.
For my update, I spent yesterday reviewing the sprint planning feedback and updating our project timeline. I also had a one-on-one with the product manager about the upcoming features.
Today I'll be working on the technical specification for the notification system and preparing for tomorrow's architecture review meeting.
Alice, should we schedule a quick sync about the notification system? I have some ideas about the implementation.
Absolutely. Let's chat after lunch today. I'll send you a calendar invite.
Can I join that discussion too? The frontend integration might affect my dashboard work.
Of course, Carol. I'll make it a team meeting. Any other questions or concerns?
Just a quick reminder that the code review for the authentication module is ready when you both have time.
I'll take a look at it this afternoon. Thanks for the heads up, Bob.
Great. I think that covers everything for today. Let's keep the momentum going and have a productive day. Talk to you all tomorrow.
Thanks Alice. Have a great day everyone.
